Text:
lord_terabyte, Thanks for this. I just watched it and was blown away by it. 
Just a request for the future. I see this is your rip. Could you include the credits when you rip a film? I sometimes enjoy checking out the names of the actors. I also had a relative in the business and I enjoy catching his name every so often. Thanks for what you do.
Hello Freakyflicks. Will Jesus be watching my illegal download of your movie? Of course the people who upload them are just as naughty!
Thanks for upload have been wanting to see this for quite a while. But could people seed a bit more, I've been downloading for 4 days and I'm only half way through. Cheers
